name: OR_CASE_RTF_INSTR
description: This table contains the case instructions information for the surgical case (ORC) record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedural case record.

columns.name: INSTRUCTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of instructions on this line.

columns.name: INSTRUCTION_ID
columns.description: The ID of the instructions HNO record.

columns.name: INSTRXNS_EDITED_YN
columns.description: Has the instructions record on this line been edited since it was last built?
